Info.Title: Blood Glacier
Info.Writer: Benjamin Hessler (screenplay), Marvin Kren (screenplay contributor), Claudia Kolland (dramatisation)
Info.Actors: Gerhard Liebmann, Edita Malovcic, Santos, Hille Beseler
Info.Plot: Scientists working in the Austrian Alps discover that a glacier is leaking a liquid that appears to be affecting local wildlife.
